text: Renzo Calegari (5 September 1933 â€“ 5 November 2017) was an Italian comics artist. He was born in Genoa, Italy. His best known work was the long lasting comic book series Storia del West, which run from 1967 until 1980, and for which he illustrated many stories. Calegari died on 5 November 2017 in Chiavari, Italy of complications from a stroke at the age of 84.Morto Renzo Calegari, disegnatore di "Storia del West" ==References== ==Other websites== * Renzo Calegari at Lambiek Category:1933 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Italian comics artists Category:Italian cartoonists Category:Artists from Genoa
title: Renzo Calegari
